definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: She was rejected by her father and his second wife. Zora was forced to take care of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她父親和繼母不養她，卓拉被迫自己照顧自己。

sentences.english: Do you think that your mother and I are maltreating you?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲我和你繼母在虐待你？

sentences.english: But I do not mean to give you the idea that talk is all it takes to be a good parent or stepparent.
sentences.chinese: 但我的意思並非只要交談就能當好父母或繼父繼母。

sentences.english: Mother suggests pleasant things, but mother-in-law does not.
sentences.chinese: 母親使人想起的是愉悅的東西，但是繼母就不同。

sentences.english: Why are some stepmothers so ruthless?
And for twenty-two years thereafter he served as the head of his stepmother’s armies.
sentences.chinese: 並且在之後的22年裏，他都是自己繼母的軍隊首領。

sentences.english: Stepmother should have fresh fish, the weather is cold freezing, nowhere is bought.
sentences.chinese: 繼母要喫鮮魚，天寒冰凍，無處購買。

sentences.english: Her stepmother and stepsisters were very horrid to Cinderella.
sentences.chinese: 她的繼母和繼姐妹對灰姑娘非常憎惡。

sentences.english: The room next to it is my step mom's walk-in closet.
sentences.chinese: “那個屋子”是我繼母的大衣櫥。

sentences.english: When the police was doing investigation, his stepmother claimed she beat him for love.
sentences.chinese: 當民警調查時，其繼母竟稱愛他纔打他。

sentences.english: They grew up in one-parent families or with stepmothers and stepfathers.
sentences.chinese: 他們在單親家庭里長大或是繼父繼母帶大的。

sentences.english: I do not seem to be able to please my step-mother and Isable; more.
sentences.chinese: 看來我沒辦法使繼母和伊莎貝爾滿意。

sentences.english: He is the Prince of Ayodhya and is banished to a forest by his stepmother.
sentences.chinese: 他是阿約迪亞的王子，被他的繼母流放到森林。

sentences.english: So, you think that your mother and I have maltreated you?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，你認爲我和你繼母虐待你了嗎？

sentences.english: Two witnesses to the brutality are Sophia's stepmother Natalia and her son Peter.
sentences.chinese: 索菲婭的繼母納塔莉亞及其子彼得目睹了這場暴行。

sentences.english: The room next to it is my step mom's walkin closet.
sentences.chinese: “那個屋子”是我繼母的大衣櫥。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)
one's own (child) (i.e. one's child by birth)/biological (parents)/birth (parents)
to be orphaned of one's father
Zhangzi county in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1]
daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line
the return of a prodigal son (idiom)
